name: Boom-Bahh
description:
Solving puzzles is easy, solving logical puzzles is the last thing. Solving physical puzzles with elements of logic, backed up by explosions - is what you need, in order to test your smartness, agility and logical thinking.
A lot of interesting levels where you need to explode bombs, push your hero and get into the saving pipe
Funny music, addictive gameplay, and many levels - will load you the world of physical puzzles with elements of logic.
